name: .CMP File Extension
summary: Learn about .CMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Settings file created using Connection Manager, a suite of software components that enables system administrators to setup Windows remote connection profiles; saves information such as the username, password, and the phone number to dial.

content: CMP files enable administrators to configure initial settings for a user's dial-up connection.
NOTE: The Connection Manager Administration Kit (CMAK) is the name of the Connection Manager tool used for setting up profiles.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
